title: Snap Clap Camera
summary: Fed up with missing on pictures because you have to click the shutter button?
description: With Snap Clap your mobile phone will become your personal photographer!  Just place your device wherever you want, join your friends and clap hands. Your photo is ready!  Simple steps to capture the best moments of your life! Snap Clap does the magic!   FEATURES: • Take pictures with the rear and the front camera• Preview camera and photos via wearable smartwatches • Trigger photo shooting remotely • Sound and light warning for photo• Set the timer • Own and ultra fast photo library• Rotate photos• Share your photos with friends via e-mail, Facebook, Twitter and so on • Manual setting of sensitivity• Selfie picture with friend• fast camera preview on wearables (Special free feature)• fast last photo share to Facebook via camera swipe (Special free feature)supported mobile phones:- all with the built-in mic and camerasupported smartwatches:- Android Wear ones, e.g. LG G Watch & Urban, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360 v2, Huawei Watch  If you want to relish and share every single moment spent with your nearest and dearest, don’t miss that chance and grab the experience with Snap Clap!   CLAP AND SAY CHEEEEESE!If you are HAPPY using our app, please kindly give us rating on Google Play Store, we will be happy too!
descriptionHTML:
With Snap Clap your mobile phone will become your personal photographer!  Just place your device wherever you want, join your friends and clap hands. Your photo is ready!  Simple steps to capture the best moments of your life! Snap Clap does the magic!

  FEATURES:

• Take pictures with the rear and the front camera
• Preview camera and photos via wearable smartwatches
• Trigger photo shooting remotely
• Sound and light warning for photo
• Set the timer
• Own and ultra fast photo library
• Rotate photos
• Share your photos with friends via e-mail, Facebook, Twitter and so on
• Manual setting of sensitivity
• Selfie picture with friend
• fast camera preview on wearables (Special free feature)
• fast last photo share to Facebook via camera swipe (Special free feature)

supported mobile phones:
- all with the built-in mic and camera

supported smartwatches:
- Android Wear ones, e.g. LG G Watch & Urban, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360 v2, Huawei Watch

  If you want to relish and share every single moment spent with your nearest and dearest, don’t miss that chance and grab the experience with Snap Clap!

  CLAP AND SAY CHEEEEESE!

If you are HAPPY using our app, please kindly give us rating on Google Play Store, we will be happy too!
comments: It is really nice and it counts down so you have time to get in position
recentChanges: fix: AutoShoot started on image save
